statusDetails.message:
Don't know how to encode {"name":"apiusername","email":"RA_automation1764939542862@gmail.com","gender":"male","status":"active"} as a byte stream.

Please use EncoderConfig (EncoderConfig#encodeContentTypeAs) to specify how to serialize data for this content-type.
For example: "given().config(RestAssured.config().encoderConfig(encoderConfig().encodeContentTypeAs("*/*", ContentType.TEXT))). .."
